RelatedSentence: RungePincockMinarco Limited ( ASX:RUL ) [ RPM ] has today provided an update on the first of its enterprise ready products , XERAS for Enterprise ( X4E ) , and advised that client implementation programmes are currently underway in South Africa , Australia and Indonesia .

Launched with the support of global ERP powerhouse SAP AG ( SAP ) , the X4E product takes this capability further by seamlessly integrating SAP 's Financial and Maintenance Management modules with the financial modelling capabilities of XERAS .
This integration allows for unprecedented levels of financial visibility and cost control , from individual mine sites through to corporate management reporting systems .
